data.text: @SenatorHick The dollar has lost value after 4 years of incredible inflation. Democrats are 100% responsible.

When borders stop functioning, everything downstream breaks.

@SenatorHick Prices are up as a result of the four years of Democrat Socialist inflationary spending. You are right in the middle of that catastrophe. Now the Trump administration is digging us out of the economic crisis you created. Look at the data and get this fraud out of office.
